thread.title: 'Interests Of Indians Is Our Foremost Concern': Says MEA After A Qatari Court Commutes Death Sentence of 8 Indians
thread.title_full: 'Interests Of Indians Is Our Foremost Concern': Says MEA After A Qatari Court Commutes Death Sentence of 8 Indians

author: @englishjagrannews
title: 'Interests Of Indians Is Our Foremost Concern': Says MEA After A Qatari Court Commutes Death Sentence of 8 Indians
text: - By Kamal Kumar - Published: Fri, 29 Dec 2023 04:45 PM (IST) - Source:JND After a special court in Qatar commuted the death sentence of eight Indian ex-Navy personnel, the Ministry of External Affairs stated on Friday that the 'interests of Indians and their families is their foremost concern'. In response to queries about the future course of action in the case, the MEA mentioned that it would await the detailed judgment before making any additional comments. However, it noted that discussions on the next steps would take place with the legal team and family members. During a press conference on Friday, MEA spokesperson Arindam Bagchi said, "The sentences have been reduced but I don't have any additional information to share until we see the detailed judgment. We would urge you again not to engage in speculation. The interests of Indians and their family members are our foremost concern. We will also of course be discussing the next possible steps with the legal team and the family members."
